title: General form of exponential function
text: In the general form of the function f(x) $$=$$ $$a b^{x+c}+d$$, a vertically $$\frac{stretches}{shrinks}$$ the function, c translates the function to the left or right, and $$d$$ translates the function up or down.
speech: In the general form of the function f(x)  is equal to  , a, b raised to the x plus c power plus, d , a vertically  stretches over shrinks  the function, c translates the function to the left or right, and  d  translates the function up or down.
pacedSpeech: In the general form of the function f(x)   is equal to
, a, b raised to the x plus c power plus, d
the function, c translates the function to the left or right, and   d
translates the function up or down.

title: Vertical translations
text: The function f(x) $$=$$ $$a b^{x+c}+d$$ is being translated upwards by $$d$$ units.
speech: The function f(x)  is equal to  , a, b raised to the x plus c power plus d  is being translated upwards by  d  units.
pacedSpeech: The function f(x)   is equal to
, a, b raised to the x plus c power plus d
is being translated upwards by   d

title: Identifying $$d$$
text: What is the value of $$d$$ in our given equation?
speech: What is the value of  d  in our given equation?
pacedSpeech: What is the value of   d

title: Horizontal translations
text: The function f(x) $$=$$ $$a b^{x+c}+d$$ is being translated c units to the left.
speech: The function f(x)  is equal to  , a, b raised to the x plus c power plus d  is being translated c units to the left.
pacedSpeech: The function f(x)   is equal to
, a, b raised to the x plus c power plus d
is being translated c units to the left.

title: Identifying c
text: What is the value of c in our given equation?
speech: What is the value of c in our given equation?
pacedSpeech: What is the value of c in our given equation?
